creator: Arrowmark Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
ColorPhone is a phone dialer that can personalize & DIY the call screen into a video caller show/call theme with fantastic ringtones.
ColorPhone can also read aloud the caller's number in the human voice and make the flash LED shine using Morse code when an incoming call so that the user can know who is calling without getting close to the phone.

「Dialer」
ColorPhone shows recent call logs. ColorPhone displays all contacts and support quick search. Users can make calls through Contacts. ColorPhone supports making and receiving multiple calls at the same time and can support multiple calls combined into a conference call. ColorPhone supports dual SIM devices.

「Call Theme/Caller Show」
Please note that the call theme and caller show refer to the same thing in this description. Call themes/Caller shows are used to personalize the look and feel of the color call flash screen.

There are thousands of fantastic video call themes available to download and use.
These video caller shows are call themes and live video wallpaper with music that can make the call screen more colorful.

There are three types of caller shows/call themes.
The first is the "color theme," a call theme based on a set of visually pleasing colors with gradient animations.
The second is the default "Arrowmark theme," which is the official call themes provided by Arrowmark. There are thousands of beautiful themes that can be downloaded.
The third is the "custom theme." Users can customize and create call themes by importing photos and videos from their phone gallery.

「Ringtones」
You can have beautiful ringtones not only from background music in the caller show videos but also from a copyright music library.

Tips for setting the music in the custom video as a ringtone: You can use the background music in the video as a ringtone during the DIY theme process. For example, you can set it by the following methods: First, record a certain video you like through the built-in or third-party screen recording app. Of course, you can also directly save your favorite videos in some short video app like TikTok and then use ColorPhone to set them as a custom theme. At this time, you can choose to set the background music in the video as a ringtone.

「Contact-specific Call Theme」
Contact-specific call themes are tailored to the different contacts on the phone.
You can set different caller shows according to each contact.
This feature is also a "Caller ID" in a sense. The app displays the call theme flash screen and ringtone music associated with the calling party. Allows recipients to know in advance who is calling by hearing a contact-specific ringtone and seeing a contact-specific video caller show before approaching the call.


「Customize」
Do it yourself!
You can choose videos and photos from the phone gallery to create a customized caller show; we provide a range of magical filters and effects in call theme video DIY editing.

「Speak Number」
When an incoming call, the caller's number can be read aloud by the human voice, so even if the user is not next to the mobile phone, the app will automatically read out the incoming call number. If it is an unknown phone number, it is likely to be a spam call such as advertising sales, and then the user can overlook it.


「LED Flash Code」
The caller's number could be translated into Morse code and displayed by switching the LED flash on and off. Similar to Speak number feature, the user can know who calls without getting close to the phone.

「Wallpapers」
The downloaded call theme video can be used to set up the caller show and can be used to set as your Home live wallpaper directly.

Contact：support@arrowmark.com
descriptionShort: ColorPhone by Arrowmark is a dialer that can personalize & DIY the call screen.

title: ColorPhone Dialer - Call Theme

creator: Arrowmark Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
ColorPhone is a phone dialer that can personalize & DIY the call screen with fantastic video call themes/call flashes and ringtones.
ColorPhone can also read aloud the caller's number in the human voice, and use LED Flash notification using Morse code when an incoming call so that the user can know who is calling without getting close to the phone. And the flashlight blinking is cool!

「Dialer」
ColorPhone shows recent call logs. ColorPhone displays all contacts and supports quick search. Users can make calls through Contacts. ColorPhone supports making and receiving multiple calls simultaneously and can support multiple calls combined into a conference call. ColorPhone supports dual SIM devices.

「Call Theme/Caller Show/Call Flash」
Please note that the call theme, caller theme, caller show, and call flash refer to the same thing in this description.

Thousands of fantastic video call themes and wallpapers are available to download and use.
These call themes are music video wallpapers that can make the call screen more colorful.

There are three types of caller shows/call themes.
The first is the "color theme," a call theme based on a set of visually pleasing colors with gradient animations.
The second is the default "Arrowmark themes," which are the official call themes provided by Arrowmark. There are thousands of beautiful pieces.
The third is the "custom theme." Users can customize and create call themes by importing photos and videos from their phone gallery.

「Contacts-specific Call Theme」
You can set different caller shows according to each contact.
The app displays the call theme flash screen and plays the ringtone music associated with the calling party. Allows recipients to hear the contacts-specific ringtone or see the call flash to know who is calling. This feature is also a video "Caller Id" in a sense.

「Ringtones」
You can have beautiful ringtones from original background music in the caller show videos or a copyright music library.

Tips for setting the music in the custom video as a ringtone: You can use the background music in the video as a ringtone during the DIY theme process. For example, you can set it by the following methods: First, record a specific video you like through the built-in or third-party screen recording app. Of course, you can also directly save your favorite videos in some short video app like TikTok and then use ColorPhone to set them as a custom theme. At this time, you can choose to set the background music in the video as a ringtone.

「Customize」
Do it yourself!
You can choose videos and photos from the phone gallery to create a customized caller show; we provide a range of magical filters and effects in HD call theme video editors. This call theme video editor is also a photo slideshow maker allowing you to import only photos.

「Speak Number」
When an incoming call, the caller's number can be read aloud by the human voice, so even if the user is not next to the mobile phone, the app will automatically read out the incoming call number. If it is an unknown phone number, it is likely to be a spam call such as advertising sales, and then the user can overlook it.


「LED Flash Notification - Morse Code」
The caller's number could be translated into Morse code and displayed by the LED Flash notification. The flashlight blinking can remind you of the incoming call in a cool way and let you know who is calling without getting close to the phone.

「Wallpapers」
The downloaded call theme video can be used to set up the caller show/call theme and can be used to set as your live wallpaper for the home screen directly.

Contact：support@arrowmark.com
descriptionShort: ColorPhone by Arrowmark is a dialer that can personalize the call screen themes.

title: Color Call Flash, Call Screen

creator: Arrowmark Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
🏆 ColorCall Phone Dialer 🏆
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Introducing ColorCall, the best phone app for call screen customization! With Color Call Screen & Themes & Ringtones by Arrowmark™, you can create stunning call screen themes with live wallpapers, ringtones and LED flash notifications.

Call Flash - Call Screen, Color Phone Flash offers thousands of call wallpapers and live wallpapers to choose from, making it easy to customize your incoming and outgoing call screens. Plus, the app features a flashlight blinking function to remind you of incoming calls in a cool way. ❤️

Our "Android Ringtones" is packed with thousands of high-quality ringtones and live wallpapers to personalize your phone and make it truly unique.

With our app, you'll have access to a massive library of ringtones in all genres, from classic to contemporary, so you can choose the perfect sound to match your mood. Whether you want to hear a soothing melody every time you receive a call or want to pump up the volume with a catchy tune, we have you covered.

Features of Color Phone Call Flash - Call Screen, Color Phone Flash by Arrowmark™ include:

* Call screen changer and phone dialer
* Lovely color call screen themes with live wallpapers
* Caller tune and ringtones customization
* LED Call Flash alerts for incoming calls
* Live wallpapers in 4K resolution

With Call Screen Themes - Call Wallpaper, you can customize your call screen wallpapers for specific contacts and make them more personalized.

LED Call Flash Alerts on Call provide a fun and colorful way to be alerted of incoming calls. You can customize the length of each call flash and use Morse code to translate phone numbers.

The app also features a phone dialer with fullscreen caller ID, smart contacts search, call log history, and beautiful caller themes. It is also compatible with dual SIM cards and multi-conference calls.

Live Wallpapers - 4K Wallpapers offer a wide variety of HD live backgrounds and wallpapers to choose from, giving your home screen and lock screen a unique and elegant look.

Download ColorCall now and start customizing your phone's call screen today! Contact us at support@arrowmark.com if you have any questions or feedback.

creator: Arrowmark Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Introducing ColorCall - Color Phone Dialer: The Ultimate Dialer & Custom Call Screen App

Transform your phone's dialing experience with "ColorCall - Color Phone Dialer," a powerful phone call app that combines the efficiency of a full-featured dialer with the creativity of custom call screens. Experience intuitive, stylish, and efficient calling with a range of added personalization features.



KEY FEATURES

DIALER-FIRST DESIGN

"ColorCall - Color Phone Dialer" is a fully functional dialer app that enhances the core functionality of your phone:




  • Sleek Design for Easy Navigation: Our user-friendly interface makes calling a breeze.

  • Fast Contact Search: With our T9 dialer, find contacts rapidly by name or number.

  • Favorites & Recents: Quick access to your most important contacts and call history.

  • Dual SIM Compatibility: Manage multiple accounts effortlessly.

  • Multi-Conference Call Support: Stay connected efficiently.



CUSTOM CALL EXPERIENCE


  • Over 400+ themes and live wallpapers to choose from, allowing you to personalize your call screens for individual contacts.

  • Full-screen caller ID for a modern calling experience.

  • Customize your phone with a variety of HD backgrounds and ringtones.



JOIN THE COLORCALL COMMUNITY


  • Intelligent Dialer: Enjoy a sleek interface with T9 input for efficient contact searches, a comprehensive call log, and quick access to your favorite contacts.

  • Personalized Call Themes: Customize your incoming and outgoing call screens with stunning live wallpapers, unique themes, and custom ringtones.

  • LED Call Flash Alerts: Be alerted to incoming calls with fun, colorful LED flash notifications, and customize the length and style of each flash.

  • High-Quality Ringtones & Wallpapers: Access a massive library of premium ringtones and 4K live wallpapers, perfect for personalizing your phone's look and sound.

  • Multilingual Support: Available in multiple languages, catering to a global audience.



We're committed to making your phone calling experience personalized and efficient. For questions or feedback, reach out to us at support@arrowmark.com. Download "ColorCall - Color Phone Dialer" now and redefine your phone dialing experience!
